abstract: The police have raided the American e-commerce giant’s Tokyo headquarters, a distribution center and the offices of an affiliate, according to Japanese news reports.

byline.original: By PAUL MOZUR and MARK SCOTT

snippet: The police have raided the American e-commerce giant’s Tokyo headquarters, a distribution center and the offices of an affiliate, according to Japanese news reports.

headline.main: Amazon Investigated in Japan Over Child Pornography
